Norfolk Island from New Zealand - Carnival Cruise Lines | World tTavellers - World Travellers Find your nearest store Destinations Our Deals About Blogs Contact Us SIGN UP Norfolk Island from New Zealand 5 Days | Auckland Roundtrip Includes onboard credit of AU$200 per cabin plus Reduced deposit Book by 30 November 2025 Deal Details Travel Dates 03 June & 15 July 2027 Sale Ends Nov 30, 2025 Priced From $691 per person Enquire Now Includes onboard credit of AU$200 per cabin plus Reduced deposit Book by 30 November 2025 Get ready to set sail from Auckland, the stunning City of Sails, on a fun-filled Carnival cruise that’s all about good times and great views! From the moment you step onboard, you’ll find endless ways to relax, play, and make memories that’ll last long after you’re back on land. Kick things off with a day at sea, where the hardest decision you’ll make is whether to hit the pool, pamper yourself at the spa, or dive into all the delicious dining options onboard. When you arrive at Norfolk Island, you’ll discover a hidden paradise packed with history, culture, and jaw-dropping scenery. Then it’s back to sea for more fun, food, and sunshine before returning to beautiful Auckland. Whether you’re after adventure, relaxation, or just a whole lot of fun, this Carnival cruise brings it all together—Auckland style! Pricing 4 Nights in an Interior Stateroom (Cat 4A) from $691* per person, twin share 4 Nights in an Oceanview Stateroom (Cat 5A) from $832* per person, twin share 4 Nights in a Balcony Stateroom (Cat 8A) from $945* per person, twin share (pictured) Pricing based on 03 June 27 departure What's Included A variety of room types, with options to sleep up to 5 people per room Stateroom attendant and daily turn-down service Great options for all six meals — breakfast, brunch, lunch, afternoon tea, dinner and late-night, that is — at the full-service Main Dining Room or the casual Lido Restaurant Specialty food spots for breakfast, lunch, dinner and snacking Lemonade, iced tea, hot chocolate, non-bottled water and non-specialty coffee and tea Amazing stage shows, live musical performances, stand-up comedy and more Clubs, bars and lounges featuring DJs spinning, karaoke, piano sing-alongs and more Deck parties, game shows, trivia contests and more fun ways to get involved A fully-stocked fitness center, plus outdoor sports activities Pools and hot tubs for all, plus an Adults-Only Retreat Itinerary Day 1 Auckland Day 2 Fun Day at Sea Day 3 Norfolk Island Day 4 Fun Day At Sea Day 5 Auckland Your Ship: Carnival Adventure Offering 13 decks and a world of fun at your fingertips, Carnival Adventure is perfect for families, couples and groups of friends who are looking to experience it all. Sailing from Sydney, plus select cruises from Melbourne and Singapore, Carnival Adventure has a huge variety of activities on board, including exciting waterslides, four relaxing pools, a thrilling Edge Adventure Park, plus a huge range of bars, entertainment and dining options. You might start your day at the waterslides, or Edge, complete with ziplining, rock climbing and abseiling. Then enjoy a lazy morning poolside, followed by a delicious family lunch. Or, how about a relaxing massage at the day spa while the kids have the time of their lives in the kids clubs? Throw delicious dining at Luke’s Bar & Grill, great bars, and world-class entertainment into the mix and you’ve got yourself a holiday lineup that can only be described as an adventure — a Carnival Adventure. We can’t wait to welcome you onboard! Terms & Conditions Pricing is based on Choice Plus Fares: Offer applies to cabin assignment categories. Non-refundable reduced deposit per person. Offer includes non-refundable onboard credit per cabin. Deposit is non-refundable. Offer ends on November 30, 2025 11:59 PM AEDT. Bookings made as part of a group will include their amenities. Cruise rates are in New Zealand Dollar, average per person and based on double occupancy. Offer is capacity controlled and is not combinable with any other discount or promotional offer. Rates may vary by ship, stateroom type and sail date. Change fees are not assessed outside of the final payment window. Category restrictions and exclusions apply. Carnival reserves the right to withdraw and/or change offer at any time without prior notice. Ships' Registry: The Bahamas and Panama. Experience the world differently.
